entry.title: Lash Accessories: Nanomister
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hotlashes Expert Eyelash Extension Stockist
Type: Eyelash Extension Tools
Price: 65.00

A Nanomister is an essential tool for Expert Eyelash Extension Artists.Â  The Nanomister is designed to speed up the process of drying and cure the eyelash extension adhesive. It is a miracle worker! The nano mister sprays very small water droplets to help this reaction happen evenly throughout the lashes. It helps dry each individual layer faster and completely as you put on the lashes, so we recommend that you use the nano mister on your clients throughout the lash application process. This helps eliminate any burning sensation and a lot of irritation that may take place during the appointment or afterward.
